document_data.name: Tordarr
document_data.mainbody: '''Tordarr''' was a "bravo" (blademaster) and a member of a cell of the [[Cult of Reborn Flame]] that operated out of [[Sambral]], one of the [[Windrise Ports]] of [[Laerakond]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Burning Scent of Perfumed Swords|33}}
document_data.Description: Tordarr was a young and lithe [[dragonborn]] male.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Tordarr was recruited by [[Bazamarl]] to join his cell of the Cult of Reborn Flame. He joined because he was tired of the hardships his family had to endure, and because he was addicted to [[incense]]. Because of his brief time in the cult, he was not a worshiper of the [[primordial]] [[Achazar]]. He was also a member of a troupe of bravos.

Two weeks later, a band of [[adventurer]]s that were sent by [[Halagothra|Halagothra the Healer]] to Sambral to destroy the cell of the cult operating there, killed both Bazalmarl and the [[Firebird (elemental)|Firebird]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Burning Scent of Perfumed Swords|45}} Tordarr fled in panic, avoiding being killed by the adventurers.{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Burning Scent of Perfumed Swords|40}}
